g.text: CreateMiner(ownerPubKey PubKey, workerPubKey PubKey, pledgeAmt TokenAmount)

text.tspan: [ If Client Does Not Have PIP ]
Using tickets derived in failed election proof in last epoch

g.text: block ← AssembleBlock([Message], Tipset, EP, T0, StorageMiner.Address)

text.tspan: [ Miner DID NOT win blocks this proving period -- deadline challenge ]
FaultSet is all sectors if no post submitted
sectors Faulted longer than threshold proving periods are destroyed
Does storageCollateral live with StorageMarketActor, or storageMiningActor? Does pledgeCollateral (create separate consensus collateral) live with StorageMiningActor or StoragePowerActor.
